 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָגַב‎</span>] **verb** ==have inordinate affection, lust== (compare Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***wonder, admire***, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***beloved***; and (on sens. obsc. in Late Hebrew) [[BDB#Levy|Levy]]<sup>NHWB iii. 616</sup>); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָֽגְבָה‎</span> [[Ezek.23.7|Ezek 23:7]]; [[Ezek.23.9|Ezek 23:9]]; [[Ezek.23.12|Ezek 23:12]] ***Imperfect*** 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַתַּעְגַּב‎</span> v[[Ezek.23.5|Ezek 23:5]], + v[[Ezek.23.16|Ezek 23:16]] [[BDB#Kt|Kt]] ([[BDB#Qr|Qr]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַתַּעְגְּבָה‎</span>), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַתַּעְגְּבָּה‎</span> v[[Ezek.23.20|Ezek 23:20]] ([[BDB#Ew|Ew]]<sup>§ 191 c</sup> [[BDB#Ol|Ol]]<sup>§ 228 b</sup>); ***Participle*** plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֹגְבִים‎</span> [[Jer.4.30|Jer 4:30]] — ***lust*** after (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַלֿ‎</span>), only in figure of relations of Samaria and Jerusalem (personified) with foreigners [[Ezek.23.5|Ezek 23:5]]; [[Ezek.23.9|Ezek 23:9]]; [[Ezek.23.12|Ezek 23:12]]; [[Ezek.23.16|Ezek 23:16]]; [[Ezek.23.20|Ezek 23:20]], so with accusative v[[Ezek.23.7|Ezek 23:7]] participle as substantive ***paramours*** [[Jer.4.30|Jer 4:30]].
